9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abbas bin Rabi'ah said:"I saw Umar bin Al-Khattab kissing the (Black) Stone and saying: 'I am kissing you while I know that you are just a stone, and if I had not seen the Messenger of Allah kissing you, I would not kiss you

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَقْبِيلِ الْحَجَرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Kissing The (Black) Stone
